DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Hepatitis C Antibody Positive Finding Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not a patient's HCV antibody test is positive.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Hepatitis C Antibody Positive Finding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._An antibody produced by B-lymphocytes in response to hepatitis C virus infection._An observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Hepatitis C Antibody Positive Finding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: An antibody produced by B-lymphocytes in response to hepatitis C virus infection.:An observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: An antibody produced by B-lymphocytes in response to hepatitis C virus infection.
A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016
